analysis.description: Network Architect delivers interactive, secure visualizations of Hyper-V Stretched Cluster cabling and infrastructure across dual data centers, enabling instant comprehension of complex high-availability networks. Enterprise IT teams achieve zero-downtime resilience with RTO<2min and zero data loss through precise, rack-level documentation.

valueProposition: Interactive rack layouts and cabling diagrams for disaster recovery validation
Executive summaries with power, bandwidth, and RTO/RPO metrics
Secure, deployment-ready tool with versioned changelogs for audit compliance

customerSegments.name: Enterprise IT Architects & Data Center Managers
pain_points: Complexity of documenting stretched cluster cabling across sites
Downtime risks from misconfigured Hyper-V redundancy and storage replication

customerSegments.name: Managed Service Providers (MSPs)
pain_points: Client audits requiring visual proof of HA infrastructure
Onboarding delays due to unclear network topologies
